title: Did an eight-year-old Yemeni bride die of internal injuries?
subtitle: An eight-year-old Yemeni girl reportedly died of internal bleeding on her wedding night after marrying a man five times her age.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An 8-year-old Yemeni girl was forced to marry a 40-year-old man and died of vaginal injuries on her wedding night.
